pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video shows a dry, hilly landscape with scattered rocks and sparse vegetation. A group of cows is grazing on the hill, spread out across the terrain. The background features rolling hills and a distant view of mountains under a partly cloudy sky. The camera slowly pans to the left, revealing more of the landscape and the cows continuing to graze.
